title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When finishing the JAR creation process without saving open files, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
OB: After pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, a 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5' error message is shown.
EB: After pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, the JAR creation process should complete successfully, even if there are unsaved open files.
SR: 1. Open a file in the project.2. Make changes to the file without saving.3. Open the JAR packager for the project.4. Provide all the necessary information for the JAR packager (path, destination, name, etc.).5. Click on the 'Finish' button to start the JAR creation process.
